input.sentences: the local fitness centers held a get healthy event at one of our local parks .
the staff was there to show us different exercises and classes that they offered .
i joined in one of the free yoga exhibitions .
my friend and i really had a great time .
it was nice to see all the vendors there encouraging us to be healthier .
output.sentences: Meetings are held at the local park
it was a good time with a friend
the vendors were nice and the options were healthy
